subject: Boxing
Accidents and Safety
United States Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: For the fourth year in a row, Senator Byron Dorgan, Democrat of North Dakota, is seeking to implement legislation that would curb the shortcomings of boxing’s medical safeguards.
snippet: For the fourth year in a row, Senator Byron Dorgan, Democrat of North Dakota, is seeking to implement legislation that would curb the shortcomings of boxing’s medical safeguards.
